Supermajority.origin: [a provision requiring a vote — say, 80 % of the common shares instead of the usual bare majority rule "R. C. Clark"]

1.1: a large majority [a provision requiring a vote — say, 80 % of the common shares instead of the usual bare majority rule "R. C. Clark"]
